Prawn in Malai Curry or Chingri Malai Curry (West Bengal) or As we call it Chingudi Nadia Rasa( #Odisha). It is a #Bengali dish but  originated in #Malaysia. The term Malai means Malay or Malaysia .It is one of the  traditional recipe of my mother that I love. ❣️
